::Magmatron/Cerberus/Dachande/Jynx/Obitus/AEger/
Fame/Bellum/Neamen Hydra/E=
clipse/Wolveritron::

Magmatron and Cerberus were ready to go, they had wea=
pon systems on and guns aimed, but they did not fire. They watched as volly=
s were being fired.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Jynx and t=
he Four Nightmares opened fire on The Oblitercons. They fire one shot each =
at them and turn to look at Magmatron and Cerberus, their leaders. They wer=
en't firing so Jynx and the Nightmares stopped.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Neamen Hydra went to Hydra mode and went into a frenzy, sh=
e shot at The Oblitercons, Deamon Wulf, Dark Claw, Flesh Ripper, Six Shot, =
Ares, Manterror, Injector, BumbleBee, Double Punch, and Unitron. Then he fa=
lls to the ground, tired from his frenzy. He crawls away from the battle.
~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Eclipse and Wolveritron didn't k=
now who to fire at so they watched to see who fired at the ones they came h=
ere with.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dachande, in robot mo=
de, climbed a tree, there he cloaked and targeted Alliance members. Using h=
is shoulder cannon he shot at BumbleBee and then at Injector. He pulled out=
 his spear gun and fired at Double Punch and Unitron. His cloak dropped bec=
ause of the gun but he sat up in the tree, still pretty much unable to be s=
een by the naked optic and waited for another great hunting opportunty.
